adversarial_findings.summary: artifact_index does not cover all manifest-declared output artifacts, leaving declared outputs outside hash-index integrity coverage.
adversarial_findings.risk: Post-run mutation or substitution of unindexed outputs can evade forensic hash verification and break reproducibility claims.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Enforce 1:1 coverage between manifest output artifact paths and artifact_index entries; fail validation when any declared output is unindexed.

adversarial_findings.summary: Active round-2 red-team artifact cites obsolete adjudication filenames that are not the current bundle artifacts, so the cited evidence set is stale.
adversarial_findings.risk: Governance decisions are being driven by a fail artifact whose evidence paths no longer map cleanly to the current reviewed bytes.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Re-run adversarial review against current rowsetA20 artifact paths and update gate pointer to the new evidence-backed red-team report.

adversarial_findings.summary: Retrospective claims placeholder witness cleanup, but adjudication/reasoning rows still contain ellipsis placeholders.
adversarial_findings.risk: Narrative-to-artifact mismatch weakens trust, and placeholder-heavy witness text can degrade training-data clarity.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Remove placeholder ellipses from witness fields or explicitly mark truncation policy and reissue retrospective claims after verification.

adversarial_findings.summary: Manual-authorship provenance is still attestation-heavy: command_log records attestations and validators but not concrete creation lineage for adjudication files.
adversarial_findings.risk: A malicious or accidental pre-validation rewrite could be hard to detect with only post-hoc attestations and no write-chain evidence.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Capture signed per-artifact lineage events (writer, command/action, timestamp, file hash) for batch/reasoning/queue-update creation and make validator enforce them.

verified: Gate is explicitly failed and still in adversarial in_review state with red_team_verdict=fail.
Canonical diagnostic placeholders are explicitly marked not_run_day2.
Adjudication batch, reasoning, and queue update artifacts each contain 20 rows with 1:1 row linkage and split=train.
